Code preview of the domain 短說明

use YTMES
go

if exists(select 1 from systypes where name='type_short_text')
drop type type_short_text
go

use YTMES
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Domain: type_short_text */
/*==============================================================*/
create type type_short_text
from national char varying(50)
go
